name: formiga
description: The simplest -yet effective- form validator for React
author: Donato Lorenzo <donato@afialapis.com>

scripts.lib: npm run --silent clean-lib && npx xeira transpile
scripts.dist: npm run --silent clean-dist && npx xeira bundle
scripts.prepare: npm run --silent clean-demo && npm run --silent lint && npm run --silent test && npm run --silent lib && npm run --silent dist
scripts.demo: npm run --silent clean-demo && npx xeira demo
scripts.reset: npm run --silent clean-demo && npm run --silent clean-lib && npm run --silent clean-dist && rm -fr node_modules package-lock.json && npm i
